title.content: Semrush Local | The ultimate solution for local SEO

metaDescription.content: Get a hyper-local view at your online visibility. Keep business info up-to-date across every major online directory. Manage and respond to customer reviews.

Get the Best Local Marketing Tools for Your Business

Businesses that rank higher locally get more views, clicks, and site visits, and have more opportunities to make a sale. Semrush Local provides the tools and data you need to rank higher on maps and local search results. 1. Automatically list and manage your business info in 150+ top directories ‚Ä¢ Manage and optimize Google ‚Ä¢ Business Profiles for multiple locations in one platform ‚Ä¢ Distribute your business NAP (name, address, phone) across applications, maps, aggregators, and search engines (e.g., Google, Facebook, Bing, and Yelp) ‚Ä¢ Suppress duplicate listings and manage corrections and real-time user suggestions in one place to ensure your business information is up-to-date and consistent. 2. Centralize review monitoring and respond quickly to Google reviews from one platform ‚Ä¢ Get an overview of your reviews from multiple review sites on one platform ‚Ä¢ Put your Google review management on autopilot with AI-generated replies and suggestions ‚Ä¢ Get notified of bad reviews and defuse them quickly with the right responses 3. Get a 360 view of where you stand on Google Maps ‚Ä¢ Quickly see how you rank for target keywords based on user location ‚Ä¢ Evaluate your online presence in comparison to competition with easy-to-understand metrics ‚Ä¢ Customize your tracking experience by setting the preferred map grid size, distance, and reporting schedule Set your local business for success with Semrush Local.

Key Features

üß≤

üèÜ
Stay ahead of local competitors

Get the Best Local Marketing Tools for Your Business
Businesses that rank higher locally get more views, clicks, and site visits, and have more opportunities to make a sale. Semrush Local provides the tools and data you need to rank higher on maps and local search results. 

1. Automatically list and manage your business info in 150+ top directories

‚Ä¢ Manage and optimize Google
‚Ä¢ Business Profiles for multiple locations in one platform
‚Ä¢ Distribute your business NAP (name, address, phone) across applications, maps, aggregators, and search engines (e.g., Google, Facebook, Bing, and Yelp)
‚Ä¢ Suppress duplicate listings and manage corrections and real-time user suggestions in one place to ensure your business information is up-to-date and consistent.

2. Centralize review monitoring and respond quickly to Google reviews from one platform

‚Ä¢ Get an overview of your reviews from multiple review sites on one platform
‚Ä¢ Put your Google review management on autopilot with AI-generated replies and suggestions
‚Ä¢ Get notified of bad reviews and defuse them quickly with the right responses

3. Get a 360 view of where you stand on Google Maps

‚Ä¢ Quickly see how you rank for target keywords based on user location 
‚Ä¢ Evaluate your online presence in comparison to competition with easy-to-understand metrics
‚Ä¢ Customize your tracking experience by setting the preferred map grid size, distance, and reporting schedule

Set your local business for success with Semrush Local.
